review: Dr Ayush clarified all the doubts we had nicely  and we are happy to recommend him further. In fact , I have already recommended.

The doctor was really friendly and they helped me out immensely. I had earlier consulted many doctors but nothing brought me relief *** **** **** ****** ************ *** helped me get a diagnosis which other doctors failed to. I highly recommend them!

They don't have any good facilities here.  Even if you go to get the report, doctors charge fee again.  Fixed MRP is charged on generic medicine.**** ***  ****** ***** ***** *****  I had normal constipation and I were recommended for many tests ***** **** *** *********very disappointed this docter and hospital

After appointment we had some follow up questions for doctor. First we put it on practo but didn't received the reply for 36 hours. Then we contacted hospital staff they gave us a landline number of the doctor. We called on the number and doctor told us to put it on practo. But it's already there on practo ...while I understand these are tough times for doctors too but stranding patient in middle of treatment doesn't sounds good
**** ****** *** good consultation. He was helpful and understanding and explained the problem well. Good experience.
